sentences.sContent: He can neither read nor write (= he cannot read or write ).
Hilary was neither shocked nor surprised by the news.
sentences.sCn: 希拉里对这个消息既没有感到震惊，也没有觉得意外。

sentences.sContent: Neither Matt nor Julie said anything.
sentences.sCn: 马特和朱莉都没有说什么。

sentences.sContent: ‘I don’t want to go.’ ‘Nor do I.’
...nor is it for lack of available information...
...nor do you need an abundance of skill...

trans.tranOther: used when mentioning two things that are not true or do not happen
